00030 QVariant ObjectRemoveModel::data( const QModelIndex& index, 
00031                                                                                            int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole*/ ) const {
00032         if (!index.isValid())
00033                 return QVariant();
00034 
00035         // if row is invalid
00036         if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= items_.size())
00037                 return QVariant();
00038 
00039         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00040 
00041                 switch (index.column()) {
00042                         case 0: 
00043                                 // if object is vlnv then display the vlnv fields.
00044                                 if (items_.at(index.row()).type_ == ObjectRemoveModel::VLNVOBJECT) {
00045                                         QString name(items_.at(index.row()).vlnv_.getVendor());
00046                                         name += QString(":");
00047                                         name += items_.at(index.row()).vlnv_.getLibrary();
00048                                         name += QString(":");
00049                                         name += items_.at(index.row()).vlnv_.getName();
00050                                         name += QString(":");
00051                                         name += items_.at(index.row()).vlnv_.getVersion();
00052                                         return name;
00053                                 }
00054                                 // if object is file then return it's path
00055                                 else {
00056                                         return items_.at(index.row()).path_;
00057                                 }
00058                         case 1:
00059                                 if (items_.at(index.row()).type_ == ObjectRemoveModel::VLNVOBJECT)
00060                                         return tr("VLNV object");
00061                                 else
00062                                         return tr("File");
00063                         default:
00064                                 return QVariant();
00065                 }
00066         }
00067         // only first column is checkable
00068         else if (role == Qt::CheckStateRole && index.column() == 0) {
00069                 if (items_.at(index.row()).checked_)
00070                         return Qt::Checked;
00071                 else
00072                         return Qt::Unchecked;
00073         }
00074 
00075         // if tool tip is requested
00076         else if (role == Qt::ToolTipRole || role == Qt::StatusTipRole) {
00077 
00078                 // if item is vlnv object
00079                 if (items_.at(index.row()).type_ == ObjectRemoveModel::VLNVOBJECT)
00080                         return tr("Removes the library object from the library and the xml-file"
00081                         " from file system");
00082                 
00083                 // if item is file in file system
00084                 else
00085                         return tr("Removes the file from the file system");
00086         }
00087 
00088         // if unsupported role
00089         else {
00090                 return QVariant();
00091         }
00092 }

00094 QVariant ObjectRemoveModel::headerData( int section,
00095                                                                                                          Qt::Orientation orientation,
00096                                                                                                          int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole*/ ) const {
00097         // only horizontal headers are supported
00098         if (orientation != Qt::Horizontal) 
00099                 return QVariant();
00100 
00101         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00102 
00103                 switch (section) {
00104                         case 0:
00105                                 return tr("Name");
00106                         case 1:
00107                                 return tr("Type");
00108                         default:
00109                                 return QVariant();
00110                 }
00111         }
00112 
00113         // if unsupported role
00114         else {
00115                 return QVariant();
00116         }
00117 }

00119 void ObjectRemoveModel::addItem( const Item& item ) {
00120         beginInsertRows(QModelIndex(), items_.size(), items_.size());
00121         items_.append(item);
00122         endInsertRows();
00123 }

00125 void ObjectRemoveModel::createItem( const VLNV& vlnv, bool locked) {
00126         ObjectRemoveModel::Item item(vlnv);
00127         item.locked_ = locked;
00128         
00129         if (!items_.contains(item)) {
00130                 beginInsertRows(QModelIndex(), items_.size(), items_.size());
00131                 items_.append(item);
00132                 endInsertRows();
00133         }
00134         
00135 }

00137 void ObjectRemoveModel::createItem( const QString& filePath ) {
00138         ObjectRemoveModel::Item item(filePath);
00139 
00140         if (!items_.contains(item)) {
00141                 beginInsertRows(QModelIndex(), items_.size(), items_.size());
00142                 items_.append(item);
00143                 endInsertRows();
00144         }
00145 }

00147 Qt::ItemFlags ObjectRemoveModel::flags( const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00148         if (!index.isValid())
00149                 return Qt::NoItemFlags;
00150         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= items_.size())
00151                 return Qt::NoItemFlags;
00152         
00153         // if item is locked
00154         else if (items_.at(index.row()).locked_)
00155                 return Qt::NoItemFlags;
00156 
00157         // if column is 0 and item is not locked
00158         else if (index.column() == 0)
00159                 return Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable | Qt::ItemIsUserCheckable;
00160 
00161         // other columns can be selected but not checked.
00162         else
00163                 return Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable;
00164 }

00166 bool ObjectRemoveModel::setData( const QModelIndex& index, const QVariant& value,
00167                                                                 int role /*= Qt::EditRole*/ ) {
00168         if (!index.isValid())
00169                 return false;
00170 
00171         // if row is invalid
00172         if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= items_.size())
00173                 return false;
00174 
00175         if (role == Qt::CheckStateRole) {
00176                 if (value.toInt() == Qt::Checked) {
00177                         items_[index.row()].checked_ = true;
00178                         emit dataChanged(index, index);
00179                         return true;
00180                 }
00181                 else {
00182                         items_[index.row()].checked_ = false;
00183                         emit dataChanged(index, index);
00184                         return true;
00185                 }
00186         }
00187         else
00188                 return false;
00189 }

00191 QList<ObjectRemoveModel::Item> ObjectRemoveModel::getItemsToRemove() const {
00192 
00193         QList<ObjectRemoveModel::Item> removable;
00194         foreach (ObjectRemoveModel::Item item, items_) {
00195                 if (item.checked_)
00196                         removable.append(item);
00197         }       
00198         return removable;
00199 }
00200 
00201 void ObjectRemoveModel::onSelectionChange( int selectionState ) {
00202         // if all items are to be selected
00203         if (selectionState == Qt::Checked) {
00204                 for (int i = 0; i < items_.size(); ++i) {
00205                         items_[i].checked_ = true;
00206                         QModelIndex index = QAbstractTableModel::index(i, 0, QModelIndex());
00207                         emit dataChanged(index, index);
00208                 }
00209         }
00210         // if all are to be unselected
00211         else {
00212                 for (int i = 0; i < items_.size(); ++i) {
00213                         // if item is not locked
00214                         if (!items_[i].locked_) {
00215                                 items_[i].checked_ = false;
00216                                 QModelIndex index = QAbstractTableModel::index(i, 0, QModelIndex());
00217                                 emit dataChanged(index, index);
00218                         }
00219                 }
00220         }
00221 }

00239 bool ObjectRemoveModel::Item::operator==( const Item& other ) const {
00240         // if both have vlnv defined and they are the same
00241         if (type_ == ObjectRemoveModel::VLNVOBJECT && 
00242                 other.type_ == ObjectRemoveModel::VLNVOBJECT &&
00243                 vlnv_ == other.vlnv_)
00244                 return true;
00245 
00246         // if both have path defined and they are the same
00247         else if (type_ == ObjectRemoveModel::FILE &&
00248                 other.type_ == ObjectRemoveModel::FILE &&
00249                 path_ == other.path_)
00250                 return true;
00251         else
00252                 return false;
00253 }
